title: 20 perches land with house for sale
details:
House with 20 perches land for urgent sale. Value only for land.
Large living area with 3 bedrooms and 1 bath. Mainline water and Electricity.
Very close to Sri Sumangala Boys School Panadura (150m).
Close to Panadura Town (1km). Good residential area with peaceful environment.
Selling price 650,000 per perch. Total value : 13000000
Genuine buyers only do not call brokers.
